summary:
Rendalli\'s Retextures Golden Inlaid Ebony Mail

Gives some extra gold inlay to the Ebony Mail.
descriptionHtml:
Rendalli\'s Retextures Golden Inlaid Ebony Mail

Gives some extra gold inlay to the Ebony Mail.
works best with my golden ebony armor pack(for gloves, boots, and helm).
found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4197


dont forget to endorse if you like it.

just unzip to main skyrim directory.
author: Rendalli
